name: Shitting Pigeon
description:
You are an insolent city pigeon. And in order to gain more authority among other birds, you do dark things. Your goal is to cause the greatest harm to city residents. Flying over their heads and cars, drop your bombs and create chaos. Watch your stomach and don't forget to check out the local trash cans for refreshments.

Shitting Pigeon is a 3D pigeon stealth action game and bird droppings simulator. Fly over the city, scare people and eat
a lot of bread.

Game Features:
- The whole city from a bird's eye view
- Pigeon is bad
- Open world
